revised_title: The Use of Galvanism in Treating Asthma and Respiratory Disorders
tldr: The author discusses the use of galvanism in treating asthma and respiratory disorders. They found that galvanism can provide relief in cases of habitual asthma by stimulating the nervous system and improving the secretion process. The author also explains the application process and its effects on patients, stating that galvanism can be a valuable means of relief in certain respiratory diseases.
